attributes.action: "None of the Above" box on General Election Ballot Papers
attributes.additional_details: In time for the forthcoming general election, a "none of the above" box should be included on ballot papers to allow voters clearly to express their disdain for the candidates and/or their parties without having to resort to voting for "protest parties", nor spoiling their papers.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/2015
